about_the_game:
Omni Axes is an authentic 3D shooting game. You play in a 3D cube space and take down the enemies coming at you from all directions to aim for a high score.

You move along the three axes using your keyboard and change the camera angle and target location with your mouse. Fly anywhere you want in the 3D space as you evade, aim and shoot. This game takes the essence of shooting games and refines each element.

The difficulty goes up as you play, so you can feel yourself progressing as you advance through the game.

Main Features:
- Completely different game modes for you to enjoy
- Flashy and exhilarating hit effects
- Original chiptune soundtrack
- Many model designs, from traditional to cute!
